aixm:MissedApproachGroup.aixm:instruction: Climb on runway track to 2500, after passing 1500 radar vectoring will be provided

aixm:LinguisticNote.aixm:note: Only sked or charter flights or general aviation may operate at the aerodrome
H24, except for the periods 0500-0600 (0400-0500) and 2000-2100 (1900-2000) when only scheduled or charter flights or general aviation may operate at the aerodrome.
H24, izemot laika periodu no 0500-0600 (0400-5000) un no 2000-2100 (1900-2000), kad var tikt veikti tikai regulrie, rtera vai visprjs avicijas lidojumi.
Only sked or charter flights or general aviation may operate at the aerodrome

aixm:LinguisticNote.aixm:note: RWY 18/36: Designation, THR, TDZ, aiming point, CL, edge marked. RWY18/36: THR, TDZ, CL, RWY end, edge lighted.
RWY18/36: marti apzmjumi, THR, TDZ, galapunkts, CL, malas. RWY18/36: ar ugunm THR, TDZ, CL, RWY gals, malas.
Red, LIH at all RWY holding PSN RWY 18/36 guard lights at TWYs A, B, C, D, E, G, K and Y.
Sarkanas, augstas intensittes ugunis viss gaidanas viets pie skrejcea. RWY 18/36 aizsardzbas ugunis pie TWY A, B, C, D, E, G, K un Y.
